mapper.select: SELECT a.article_code, a.category, a.press, a.title, a.summary, a.url, a.public_dt, a.views, a.reg_dt, a.mod_dt FROM article a WHERE a.category = ( SELECT a2.category FROM user_click_log l JOIN article a2 ON l.article_code = a2.article_code WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND TRUNC(l.clicked_at) BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 7 AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY a2.category ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) ORDER BY a.views DESC, a.reg_dt DESC FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CASE ar.category WHEN 10 THEN '정치' WHEN 20 THEN '경제' WHEN 30 THEN '사회/문화' WHEN 40 THEN '스포츠' WHEN 50 THEN '연예' WHEN 60 THEN 'IT/과학' END AS category, COUNT(*) AS clickCount FROM user_click_log ul JOIN article ar ON ul.article_code = ar.article_code WHERE ul.user_id = #{userId} AND ul.clicked_at >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) AND ul.clicked_at < TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) + 7 AND ar.category IS NOT NULL AND ar.category IN (10,20,30,40,50,60) GROUP BY ar.category ORDER BY clickCount DESC

WITH week_days AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) + (LEVEL-1) AS d, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) + (LEVEL-1), 'FMDY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') AS day_label, LEVEL AS dow_num FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ), clicks AS ( SELECT TRUNC(l.clicked_at) AS d, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM user_click_log l WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.clicked_at >= TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) AND l.clicked_at < TRUNC(SYSDATE,'IW') - (7 * #{weekOffset}) + 7 GROUP BY TRUNC(l.clicked_at) ) SELECT w.day_label AS dayOfWeek, NVL(c.cnt, 0) AS clickCount FROM week_days w LEFT JOIN clicks c ON c.d = w.d ORDER BY w.dow_num
SELECT log_code, user_id, article_code, clicked_at FROM user_click_log ORDER BY clicked_at DESC
SELECT log_code, user_id, article_code, clicked_at FROM user_click_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY clicked_at DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT log_code AS logCode, user_id AS userId, article_code AS articleCode, clicked_at AS clickedAt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY clicked_at DESC) rn FROM user_click_log ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
